name: Super Funky Monkey Bounce Arcade
description:
Super Funky Monkey Bounce Arcade

A Music Rhythm game

Xbox Controller Recommended but not required

Press the colour button corresponding to the colour monkey as they bounce on enemies to score combos and points!

6 difficulties from Monkey Mode to Hyper Funky Monkey Mode!

3 Difficulty modes to unlock!

200 different enemies to discover!

Highscores to reach and beat!

-Controls-

Controller:
A - all green actions
B - all red actions
X - all blue actions
Y - all yellow actions
start - restart level
select - move back one screen

Keyboard:

Down arrow; "G"; Numpad2 - all green actions
Right arrow; "R"; Numpad6 - all red actions
Left arrow; "B"; Numpad4 - all blue actions
Up arrow; "Y"; Numpad8 - all yellow actions
Space; Enter - restart level
Esc - move back one screen

Mouse:

Left click - navigate menu items & button presses
Right click - move back one screen
